item.title: Running the Lucene 8.9.0 Demo on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS
item.description: I’ve been teaching people about Search Advertising lately, and I use the Lucene project to demonstrate indexing, searching, relevance, ranking, scoring, and boosting. It’s a little tricky to set up with some gotchas with build and runtime setup. I’m posting here so I can tell students where to look. This tutorial assumes a clean Ubuntu Linux 20.04 LTS system. We’ll put developer dependencies into a dev folder on the user’s home directory:
